messages.title: A Personal Message from Resham Kotecha
messages.content: Discusses the diversity and the need for voices from all ages and backgrounds. Emphasizes work to be done on living costs and speaking to residents about their priorities.

messages.title: A Fair Deal for Commuters
messages.content: Describes the issue of Southern Rail receiving tax payer money without delivering satisfactory service, and promises to ensure all companies pay out compensation they receive to users.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Committed to creating more school places and ensuring high standards.
Advocates for a fair compensation system from train companies to commuters.
Promotes responsible development and the construction of new homes.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Graph indicates the strategic importance of voting Conservative to reduce Labour lead.

issues.economy: Mentions the need to reduce the cost of living.
issues.education: Committed to creating more school places and ensuring high standards.

housing.content: Promotes responsible development and the construction of new homes.

leaflet.personalStatement: Resham Kotecha talks about her background as an Economic Researcher, her community work, and her mission to stand up for every voice in the constituency.

politicalExperience.role: School Governor for a Special Educational Needs school
politicalExperience.achievements: Emphasized the importance of high standards for all children's education.

images.caption: Resham with students and The Charter School
Graph of the voting pattern in Dulwich & West Norwood
